name: HTMLMediaElement.canPlayType
description: The HTMLMediaElement method canPlayType() reports how likely it is that the current browser will be able to play media of a given MIME type.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'canplaytype' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
